title: Centrally Located Albany Escape 10 Minutes from Middleton Beach with Daily Breakfast
description: It’s time to explore the Great Southern region of Western Australia, and ibis Styles Albany is the perfect base! A small city on the southern tip of the state, Albany is known for its postcard-perfect and largely uncrowded beaches, fabulous hiking trails up to Bluff Knoll, and the National Anzac Centre - and a stay at ibis Styles Albany is your best launchpad to discovering everything on offer. The hotel is mere minutes from the region’s best-known strip of sand - Middleton Beach, also known as Binalup Beach - cherished for its turquoise waters that are so clear you can watch the passing sea life. Return to the hotel for a tranquil night's rest so you can do it all over again tomorrow.
offer_address: 369 Albany Highway, Albany, Western Australia 6330, Australia
